sources.title: I Demand Payment (1938) BETTY BURGESSüçïJACK LA RUE
sources.description:
Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: In 1935, Betty Burgess (1917-2002) beat out forty other actresses for her film debut as the lead in the musical CORONADO with Jack Haley. She only made four more films including this one, where it is rumored Betty had secretly wed co-star Matty Kemp during their steamy romance.

Stars: Betty Burgess, Jack La Rue, Matty Kemp, Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams
Director: Clifford Sanforth

A mentally unstable wife attempts suicide after she learns her husband is a loan shark heavily in debt to mobsters. As she recovers at a convalescent home, she falls for her doctor. But this sanctuary is shattered when her husband arrives with gangland hitmen hot on his tail.

metadata.Plot: A naive young woman gets caught up in a loan-shark racket.
metadata.Actors: Betty Burgess, Jack La Rue, Matty Kemp
